channel.title: Youtube Trending
channel.description:
This video was kindly sponsored by War Thunder! It’s an incredibly comprehensive vehicle combat game that’s genuinely a lot of fun. If you download it for free with my link, you also get a huge bonus pack including vehicles, boosters, and more: https://playwt.link/soundsmith
War Thunder is a highly detailed vehicle combat game containing over 2000 playable tanks, aircraft, and ships spanning over 100 years of development. Immerse yourself completely in dynamic battles with an unparalleled combination of realism and approachability.
SURPRISE (again)! A Mann’s Guide to the Huntsman is real. It wasn’t a bait-and-switch, this is a double feature.
Some people think that gaming guides should teach the viewer how to use an item or a character in the most optimal, effective way possible. Some people think that guides have to be a serious, well-informed take on a technique or style of play. Some people are stupid. Why bother being optimal with a weapon when you can be a true Mann Co. Mercenary and run around using it like a bumbling idiot? It's way more fun if you do that.
Co-Created by Clockwerk Smurf: https://www.youtube.com/user/marinefighter9
Animation/Thumbnails by: Toten: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUXaD2C5sgwXgio0C71qtTg Krunkidile: https://linktr.ee/krunkidile ProGamingNerd: https://www.youtube.com/@ProGamingNerdTV Steaky: https://www.youtube.com/@Steaky
Animation Concepts/Boards by: MaxiqueSt: https://www.youtube.com/c/MaxiqueSt
Custom Models/Maps by: Alaxe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZq-u6jhQrviQ905HMRvGVQ Zir Zeek: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6y_AqeNf9OkfuLk71kc-DQ
Graphics and Paintovers by: Monsieur Saboteur: https://www.youtube.com/@monsieursaboteur7282 SerialArtistry: https://www.youtube.com/@serialartistry
Additional Voice Cast: Clockwerk Smurf: https://www.youtube.com/user/marinefighter9 LazyPurple: https://www.youtube.com/c/LazyPurple Toten: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUXaD2C5sgwXgio0C71qtTg
Additional Gameplay Provided by: Clockwerk Smurf: https://www.youtube.com/user/marinefighter9 Deroplat: https://www.youtube.com/@deroplat JBird: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOaf-4kabBXZR9cAfRO4GrQ
Gameplay Skits with: Deroplat: https://www.youtube.com/@deroplat Krunkidile: https://linktr.ee/krunkidile SerialArtistry: https://www.youtube.com/@serialartistry Monsieur Saboteur: https://www.youtube.com/@monsieursaboteur7282 Gunk: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC82qnprliM2hRFEkorgpTBw Garka23: https://www.youtube.com/c/Garka23 NCTWL: https://www.tumblr.com/blog/nctwl
Special Thanks to: Uncle Dane: https://www.youtube.com/@UncleDane MaxiqueST: https://www.youtube.com/c/MaxiqueSt The ChristoLee Show: https://www.youtube.com/c/ChristopherLeeProductions Ace Creators
And an extra special thanks to War Thunder for sponsoring this video!
Here’s a pastebin of all the music tracks used in this video: https://pastebin.com/g7QVdEzT
#tf2 #soundsmith #gaming
